committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Housing and Community Development

official_title: To amend the Housing and Community Development Act of 1974 to authorize the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to impose sanctions for improper conveyance or use of properties under an urban homestead program.

summary.text: HUD Equity Restoration Act of 1989 - Amends the Housing and Community Development Act of 1974 to authorize the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to impose sanctions, including imposition of civil penalties and revocation of a transfer, for improper conveyance or use of properties under an urban homestead program after January 1, 1981.

titles.title: To amend the Housing and Community Development Act of 1974 to authorize the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to impose sanctions for improper conveyance or use of properties under an urban homestead program.
